snippet: The Commerce Department said Wednesday that single-family housing starts, the largest part of the market, jumped 7.2 percent last month to a seasonally adjusted annual pace of 728,000 units.
lead_paragraph: The Commerce Department said Wednesday that single-family housing starts, the largest part of the market, jumped 7.2 percent last month to a seasonally adjusted annual pace of 728,000 units.

headline.main: Single-Family Home Starts Are Highest Since Early ’08
headline.print_headline: * Groundbreaking for single-family homes highest since March 2008
